overview: Any night out in a big city has the potential to be a good night, the risk of being a bad night, and typically ends up somewhere in between-but only some nights can claim to be That Night. The night where little choices lead to big decisions, chance encounters to second chances, Uber drivers keep themselves busy in the strangest of ways and taking the wrong pill can be really bad for the upholstery. For STACY, an artist with one eye on the future of design and the other stuck looking hopelessly at his ex-lover, that night is tonight.
title: That Night
